立法機関: (りっぽうきかん) - legislature; legislative body
立派: (rippa) - splendid, fine, handsome, elegant, imposing, prominent; praiseworthy, creditable, worthy , splendid, fine, handsome, elegant, imposing, prominent; praiseworthy, creditable, worthy; legal, legitimate, lawful; undeniable (por exemplo, crime), indisputable, solid
立浪草: (タツナミソウ) - Scutellaria indica (species of skullcap)
立浪貝: (タツナミガイ) - wedge sea hare (Dolabella auricularia)
立消え: (たちぎえ) - going out (e.g. of a fire)/dying out; fizzling out/falling through/coming to nothing
立消える: (たちぎえる) - to go out (of a fire, etc.)/to die out (before burning to ash); to fall through (of plans, etc.)/to fizzle out/to come to nothing
立版古: (たてばんこ) - papercraft sculpture representing a scene akin to a painting

立田揚げ: (たつたあげ) - dish of fish or meat flavoured with soy sauce, mirin, etc., coated with starch and then deep-fried

立留る: (たちどまる) - to stop; to halt; to stand still
立直: (リーチ) - {mahj} declaring that one is one tile away from winning while one's hand is completely concealed (chi: lizhi); being one step away from completing something (winning, losing, game over, etc.)
立直し: (たてなおし) - revamping; reshaping; rearranging; reorganizing
立直す: (たてなおす) - to rally; to make over; to rearrange; to reorganize; to reorganise
立直る: (たちなおる) - to regain one's footing/to get back on one's feet; to recover/(of the market) to improve

立破: (りゅうは) - establishing and refuting (a doctrine)

立秋: (りっしゅう) - first day of autumn (approx. Aug. 8); first day of fall

立箸: (たてばし) - sticking chopsticks upright into a bowl of rice (a breach of etiquette)

立続ける: (たちつづける) - to keep standing
立網: (たてあみ) - fish trap; set net

立纓: (りゅうえい) - erect tail (of a traditional Japanese hat)

立者: (たてもの) - leading actor; leading figure/leader

立話: (たちばなし) - talking while standing; standing around talking
立読み: (たちよみ) - reading while standing (in a bookstore, etc.); browsing (i.e. reading an item but not buying it)
